title: Highest earning eSports countries in 2018 , by prize winnings
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Prize money in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Prize money in million U.S. dollars 28.07 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Germany where Prize money in million U.S. dollars is 4.16.
There is a difference of 23.91 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Germany.

The highest Country United States has 23.91 more Prize money in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Germany.
